title: As BOC, I can view cash considerations that are part of a trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN viewing a trade transaction
custom_expected:
THEN each cash consideration in the trade should be displayed under the ORG that is paying the money, under a collapsible sub-section called 'Cash'
AND the columns in the cash table are:
- *To* - The Org that the payment is being made to
- *Amount* - Show commas and $
- *Competitive Balance Amount* - Show commas and $
- *Payable On/Before* - Format date as mm/dd/yyyy
- *Paid on* - If populated, show as mm/dd/yyyy

**Wireframe:**
http://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=view_an_existing_trade
http://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=cash

title: As BOC, I can view players who are part of a trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN viewing an existing approved trade,
custom_expected:
THEN for each Org that was involved,  show a separate collapsible header with title '[Org name] Considerations'
AND each player that participated in the trade should be displayed under the ORG that he **originated** from under a collapsible sub-section called 'Player'
AND each player should be displayed as a row in a table. If multiple players originated from the same org, the table should have multiple rows.
AND if a player has Special Coventants in his MJ contract, display a Flag (see wire #2). Clicking on the flag opens pop-out with text "Player's contract contains special covenants"
AND data must match equivalent values in ebis 1
AND the columns in the Player table are:
- Flags column - Only show if at least 1 player in the table has special covenants
- *Player* - Last name, Roster name. Link to player history
- *Pos* - abbreviated position
- *Roster status* - Player's roster status at time of Trade submission
- *From Club* - The full name of minor or major club that player originated from
- *To Org* - Org that player is being traded to
- *To Club* - The full name of minor or major club that player is traded to
- *Written Consent* - Only show this column if at least 1 player in the table has it checked
- *Received Ins form*

**Note**
- Attachment column will be introduced in a later story
- There is no need to list the special covenants in the pop out. That is a future enhancement

**Wireframe:**
1. http://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=view_an_existing_trade
2. http://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=minor_league_player

title: As BOC, I can view the status and dates of an existing trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN I perform an advanced search for an existing trade

AND I click on a search result
custom_expected:
**Wireframe:**
http://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=view_an_existing_trade

THEN

- Each player in the trade is listed as a separate search result

AND 

- I can click on an approved trade from a player's history to view the trade

AND 

- When the trade opens, display the player header, and the status and dates section as shown in the wireframe
- All applicable fields in the status and dates section should be populated with the equivalent information from ebis 1
- The field "Submitted to Club" in ebis 1 will become "Submitted by [initiating club]" in ebis 2. For example if Boston RedSox initiated the transaction, show as 'Submitted by BOS'
- The field 'Submitted to BOC' in ebis 1, will become 'Submitted by [Approving club]' in ebis 2.  For example if MIA was the club that approved the trade, show as 'Submitted by MIA'. This field should be ordered after the initiating club.

**Global**
- Date format should be mm/dd/yyyy - hh:mm am/pm
- Quick jump menu is available
- Transaction has a Close button that takes you Back to previous location

title: As BOC, I want to view comments on a trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps: AND user views a pre-existing approved trade
custom_expected:
THEN the user can see BOC notes and Comments sections to the trade. 

AND Any existing comments from ebis 1 should appear in the comments field

title: As BOC, I want to view existing attachments in a trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing a past approved trade
custom_expected:
**Wire**
http://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=view_an_existing_trade

THEN 

- If a Notice of disposition and/or insurance form was attached to the trade,  display against the corresponding player with an attachment icon.
- Clicking on the attachment icon opens a pop out listing the attached form names. The form names can be clicked on to open the attachment
- If an Assignment Agreement was attached to the Trade, show the attachment in the general form Attached files section

*In lower environments, the attachment displayed in the transaction might not exist, resulting in the following error message: "The attached file does not exist in this environment."*

title: As BOC, I can view intl signing bonus slots that are part of a trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN that an intl signing bonus slot was part of a trade
custom_steps: WHEN BOC views that trade
custom_expected:
THEN display under the Org that it originally belonged to, under sub-section 'International Signing Bonus Slot'
AND

- Show the slot details in view mode with the columns shown in the wireframe
- Data in ebis 1 should match ebis 2

title: As BOC, I can view Rule 4 draft picks that are part of a trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a rule 4 draft pick was part of a trade,
custom_steps: WHEN BOC views that trade
custom_expected:
THEN display under the Org that it originally belonged to, under sub-section 'Rule 4 Draft Pick'
AND

- Show the draft pick details in view mode with the columns shown in the wireframe
- The Player column is blank until the respective draft has passed at which point, display the player who was drafted with that Round/Pick
- Player name should link to player history
- Data in ebis 1 should match ebis 2

title: As BOC, I want to search for Trades that have specific types of considerations
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN searching for transactions and transaction type is set to Outright Trade
custom_expected:
THEN show a sub filter that has 3 multi-select options: "Player to be named later", "Rule 4 Draft Pick", "Signing Bonus Slot", "Cash Consideration", and "Conditional Cash"
AND if a selection has been made from the Outright (Trade) Consideration sub-filters, the results should only contain transactions that have at least one of the selected considerations.

title: As a club/BOC, I can view Outright to Mx Lg transactions from ebis 1 in ebis 2
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is an OTML created in Ebis1 (e.g. https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/transaction?txId=10872147&playerId=373061)
custom_steps:
WHEN user searches for the trade in Ebis 2
AND when user views the profile history of an involved player
custom_expected:
THEN it is available in the search results
AND it is available in the player history widgets
AND all the data is correctly populated in Ebis2

title: As Club/BOC, I can view players to be named later who are part of a trade
custom_steps:
**Wireframe:**
http://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=post_approval_examples
http://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=club_names_player

**AC**
- Any approved trades with PTNL sections in ebis 1, should display correctly in ebis 2 with the same PTBNL fields.
- If a player to be named is included in the trade, show this under the Org that he will originate from, with sub-section 'Player(s) To Be Named'
- For each player to be named, show as a separate table (See wire)
- The data should match the equivalent data in ebis 1
- If the player has already been named, clubs can see the player's details only. The original PTBNL section with the alt cash value is no longer displayed for that player. However BOC continues to see the original Alt cash table and the player consideration table.
- When a non-participating club is looking at the trade and the player is not yet named, they cannot see the PTBNL section. If the player is named and approved, they can see Player details
- The 'name player' button should not appear in view mode
- Player name should link to player history

title: As a club, I can create and save a  preliminary trade from the roster
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a club or boc user
custom_steps:
WHEN I view the roster widget and click on Create New Icon
AND I select a trade
custom_expected:
THEN a preliminary trade opens
AND transaction can be saved as preliminary
AND POS, Roster Status and From Club populate automatically

title: As a club, I want to start a Trade with a player from another Org
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as a Club or Boc user
custom_steps: WHEN a club user navigates to a player's profile who is in a different org, and then creates a new trade from the 'create' icon on the player header or player history widget
custom_expected:
THEN club should be allowed to proceed with the Trade (this is already happening)
AND the trade screen should pre-load that player with the Org he belongs to (this is already happening currently)
AND additionally, the trade screen should also auto-add the initiating club to the page. 
AND the initiating club cannot remove themselves from the trade screen.
AND club can continue to build out the rest of the trade as usual and Submit it to Club

title: As a club, I can select the Orgs that will participate in my trade
custom_preconds:
**Wireframe:**
http://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=add_additional_orgs


GIVEN that user is logged in as a club (check BOC user as well)
custom_steps: WHEN user creates a trade
custom_expected:
**Wireframe:**
http://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=add_additional_orgs

THEN an "ADD ORG" button appears as shown in wire
AND Clicking on this button lets you select 1 or more Orgs using multi-select
AND Clicking 'Add' creates a section header for each Org on the Trade screen. 
AND the Section header has a delete icon that will remove the Org from the screen
AND Once an Org is added to the screen, it cannot be selected from the dropdown to be added again unless it is deleted.
AND A club user cannot delete their own Org from the screen
AND 'Cancel' button in the popout closes the pop out. Clicking anywhere else on the screen closes the pop out

title: As a club, I want to select an Authorized signatory for each Org
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user creates a trade
custom_expected:
THEN For each Org on the screen, add an "Authorized Signatory' field. 
AND The dropdown for each Org shows that Org's Authorized signatories
AND If it's a Minor league Trade, only show Signatories with 'MN Trans' in the signatory widget. 
AND If it's a Major league trade, only show Signatories with 'MJ Trans' checked in the signatory widget
AND This field is not required.
AND The "Create New" option only appears next to the Authorized Signatory field of the logged in club. Club can use this to add a new signatory from the form.

title: As a club, I want to be stopped from a Trading a player not affiliated with any Org
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as club
custom_steps: WHEN attempting to trade a player not affiliated with any Org (free agent or released)
custom_expected:
THEN onCreate Business rule #1.30 (Player must have a current or pending Org to proceed with the Trade) is run as soon as user tries to create the transaction
AND error message appears: "This transaction can only be performed on a player who is currently affiliated with an organization."

title: As BOC, I can create a trade on behalf of the club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to a player profile or roster widget
custom_expected:
THEN BOC can create and save a Trade using the Create New menu on any player 
AND The 'Paid on' fields are editable to BOC on Cash considerations, Pay schedules and Player to be Named sections. Clubs cannot edit the Paid on field
AND BOC can send MJ players to MN club and vice versa. The restrictions in #126081417 do not apply to BOC
AND BOC can add new signatories for any club involved in the trade
AND BOC can add additional rows for cash considerations for any Org
AND BOC can see and update BOC Notes section
AND BOC can upload files for all player rows for all involved Orgs in the Player section

title: As a club or BOC, I want to delete a preliminary trade
custom_steps: WHEN That user is viewing a preliminary trade
custom_expected:
THEN The delete button is available
AND Hitting delete prompts a warning. Continuing deletes the TX and returns you to previous page. Cancelling out of warning returns you to transaction

title: As a club, I can add cash considerations to the trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user creates a trade
custom_expected:
THEN 

- Club can use the "Add Considerations" menu to add a Cash Section to any Org
- A maximum of one cash consideration can be added per org so this option is no longer available in the menu once added
- The 'To' dropdown lists Orgs participating in the trade except the Org that the cash section is under. Field is required
- Amount column only accepts numbers. Auto-add commas. Field is required
- Competitive Balance Amount column is locked for editing and has the same value as Amount
- Payable on/Before is a date picker. Limit date range value from 1 month past until 1 years into the future. Field is required
- 'Paid on' field is not editable to clubs.
- Cash section can be removed with the delete icon

title: As a club, I can add a payment schedule for my cash considerations
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user adds a consideration to a trade
custom_expected:
THEN Club can add a Pay Schedule for each consideration.
AND If a pay schedule was already entered, the button is blue, otherwise it is not colored. 
AND Clicking on Pay schedule opens a light box as shown in the wire
AND The 'Paid on' column in the pay schedule is not editable by the club
AND Club can enter the pay schedule. On closing the pay schedule, the total value of all rows will be automatically populated on the main screen and locked for editing
AND System will also update the "Payable on/Before" field on the main screen with the latest date in the pay schedule 
AND Once a pay schedule is entered, the Amount value and Payable on/Before fields in the main screen are locked for editing.
AND If all rows from a pay schedule are removed, the pay scheduled is removed all together

title: As BOC, I can add additional cash considerations to the same club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps: AND user is viewing a preliminary trade
custom_expected:
THEN BOC users can add additional rows to Cash considerations sections. Any additional rows added by BOC are visible to clubs but clubs cannot themselves add rows.
AND There does not have to be any other special logic here as this is just an override feature available to BOC

title: As BOC, I can add a conditional cash consideration
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing a preliminary trade
custom_expected:
THEN

- BOC users can use the "Add Considerations" menu to add a Conditional Cash Section to any Org. 
- A maximum of one Conditional cash consideration can be added per org so this option is no longer available in the menu once added
- The 'To' dropdown lists Orgs participating in the trade except the Org that the Cond. cash section is under. Field is required
- Amount column only accepts numbers. Auto-add commas. Field is required
- Luxury Tax Amount column is automatically pre-populated with the same value as Amount but can be changed by BOC
- Payable on/Before is a date picker. Limit date range value from 1 month past until 2 years into the future. Field is required
- 'Paid on' field and 'Not met' fields are editable but not required.
- Comments can be added to each row
- Additional rows can be added.
- If conditions in #126242571 and #126242309, then show the 'BOC Approved' column which is required
- Section can be removed with the delete icon
- If all rows are deleted, remove the section automatically

title: As BOC, I can add a pay schedule for conditional cash considerations
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing a preliminary trade
custom_expected:
THEN A pay schedule can be added for each row in the Conditional Cash section by BOC
AND All expected results in [C204999](http://10.199.1.138/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/204999&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=28563) must be met except that this is BOC only functionality
AND BOC can edit the "Paid on" column in the pay schedule.

title: UAT feedback: Modify rule 1.12 and 2.06. Only run it if amount is higher than $800,000
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that there is a trade between two or more orgs
AND that org has already received a cash payment of 800,000 or more in the past 6 months
custom_steps: WHEN the user enters a cash payment of 800,000 or more and the "To" org is the org mentioned in the preconditions
custom_expected:
THEN Show the BOC approval checkbox.
AND if the counts as a required field

title: As a club, I want to attach forms for each player
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user creates a trade
custom_expected:
**Wireframe:**
http://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=add_attachments_to_considerations

THEN 

- Show an upload button against each player when the form is in edit mode as shown in wire.
- A club can only view the upload icon for players currently in thier Org
- Clicking on upload icon, opens an attached files popout
- Available labels are 'Notice of Disposition', 'Insurance Form', 'Miscellaneous', 'Proof of Payment', and 'PTBNL Assignment Agreement'
- Hitting 'continue' on the pop out closes the modal. However user must save the main form to fully save the attachments
- Hitting cancel undoes any changes to attached files
- Hitting anywhere outside closes the pop out
- User can use drag and drop and delete attachments from the pop out.

title: As a club, I can add additional players to the Trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN I open an existing trade
custom_expected:
THEN I am able to add a player by using 'add consideration' button
AND I am unable to readd the same player more than once
AND the player list shows all MN and MJ league players (unless its a MN trade - then it shows only MN players)

title: As a club, I want to be stopped from trading an MJ player to an MN team or MN player to MJ team
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user adds a player to a trade
custom_expected:
THEN 

- When populating the Player section of a trade, if the club selects a Major League player, lock the "To Club" field for that row and default the field to the major league club
- If a Minor league player is picked, re-enable the "To Club" field.
- If a Minor league player is selected, remove the Major league club option from the "To Club" dropdown
- Use player's 'Pending club' if he has one before using Current club

title: As a club, I want to know if a player's MJ contract contains special covenants
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user adds a player to a trade
custom_expected:
THEN

- If any of the players involved in the trade have an active Major league contract and that MJ contract has special covenants, show a flag to the left of the player name
- The flag column should appear only if at least one player in the table has a flag
- On clicking on the flag, open pop out  with text as shown in wire and list out the Special covenant names. Clicking anywhere outside the pop out closes it

title: As a club, I want to know if a player up for trade requires written consent for being a 10/5 man
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN club submits the trade,
custom_expected:
THEN display the written consent checkbox for that player
AND

- The written consent column only appears if at least one or more players in the table have the checkbox
- The checkbox is an editable field
- The field is required and has a red asterisk in the column header

title: As a club, I want to know if a player requires written consent for being a recently signed free agent
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps:
WHEN club creates a trade dated June 15th or earlier of the current year
AND club adds a player
AND the player being traded had a XXB FA transaction in the most recent FA filing period
custom_expected:
THEN the written consent checkbox appears
AND

- The written consent column only appears if at least one or more players in the table have the checkbox
- The checkbox is an editable field
- The field is required and has a red asterisk in the column header

title: As a club, I want to know if a player requires written consent for having a no-trade or limited trade clause in his MJ contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN user adds a player to a trade
custom_expected:
THEN

- If a player has a full No-Trade clause in his active MJC for the Org that he is being traded to, then display the written consent checkbox for that player
- If a player has a limited No-Trade clause in his active MJC for the Org that he is being traded to, and the trade date is within the clause's effective date range, then display the written consent checkbox for that player
- The written consent column only appears if at least one or more players in the table have the checkbox
- The checkbox is an editable field
- The field is required and has a red asterisk in the column header

title: As a club, I can enter an Intl signing bonus slot consideration
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps:
**Wire**
http://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=intl_signing_bonus_slot

**AC**
- Club can use the "Add Considerations" menu to add a 'International Signing Bonus Slot' Section to any Org. It can only be added once per Org
- The 'To' dropdown lists Orgs participating in the trade except the Org that the section is under. Field is required
- The 'Slot' dropdown lists all intl bonus Slots allocated to that club. This information has to ETL-ed from EBIS 1. This field is required
- Once a slot is selected, the amount column is autopopulated with the value of the slot
- Section can be removed with the delete icon
- Additional rows can be added. Club cannot re-enter the same slot to trade in multiple rows
- If all rows are deleted, remove the section automatically




*https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-558 as of 10/15/2021 (which is a configurable ebis constant), clubs should not be able to trade those intl bonus pools, if we set that date to the future then it should become available but by default until we hear otherwise the date should be set to the past and that option should be unavailable*

title: As a club, I can enter a Rule 4 draft pick consideration when I have picks to trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
**AND that club has Competitve Balance Lottery picks entered into the Ebis 2.0 Rule 4 pre-draft screen**
custom_steps: WHEN user creates a trade
custom_expected:
THEN

- Club can use the "Add Considerations" menu to add a 'Rule 4 Draft Pick' Section to any Org. it can only be added once per Org
- The 'To' dropdown lists Orgs participating in the trade except the Org that the section is under. Field is required
- 'Year' is the next upcoming draft year and not editable
- **Lottery column is locked to 'Competitive Balance and not editable**
- **Round / Pick column lists the Round Name and Pick number (eg. CBA - 2) that the club has available to it in the upcoming draft. This comes from the Pre-Draft screen where they are entered. IF THE CLUB HAS NO PICKS TO TRADE, THE DROP-DOWN HAS NO OPTIONS. This is a required field.**
- Player column is hidden until after the draft is over
- Section can be removed with the delete icon
- Additional rows can be added. Club cannot re-enter the same pick to trade in multiple rows
- If all rows are deleted, remove the section automatically

title: UAT feedback: Draft pick should NOT be able to be retraded
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND that club has received a Rule 4 competitive balance lottery draft pick in a trade
custom_steps:
WHEN club creates a trade
AND adds an R4 draft pick consideration
custom_expected: THEN that club CANNOT select any picks they have received in a trade

title: As Club, I can submit a trade for other club's review
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps:
WHEN user is viewing a preliminary trade
AND hits submit to Club button on trade
custom_expected:
THEN the trade status is updated to submitted
AND blue success notification is shown
AND updated by sections are updated with time/user information

title: As a club, I want to be stopped if I did not fill out required fields
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN club submits a trade to other clubs
custom_expected:
THEN

- If required fields with red asterisks have not been filled out, show required field hard errors. When listing the required field, also list the Org name and section name
eg. MIA Considerations - Cash - Amount is a required field
- If a file has been attached to the form, then label is a required field. Show error

**Global AC**
* Errors/warnings should trigger the global error modal
* Errors/warnings should be pinned to the browser after dismissing the error modal
* Missed required fields should be outlined in red

title: As a club, I want to be stopped if the transaction date if before the player's most recent transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
custom_steps:
WHEN user submits a trade to other clubs
AND Transaction Date is before the player's latest Approved or Submitted transactions's Transaction Date.
custom_expected: THEN show a hard error: "A transaction cannot occur before the date of the player's latest approved or pending transaction, on {TX Date}."

title: As BOC, I can submit a Trade on behalf of the club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing a preliminary trade
custom_expected:
THEN

- BOC can update the status of the trade to "Submit to Club" on behalf of the club. 
- All rule checks are overrides for BOC except for required field rule checks and bus rule 2.00  (#126260523) - at least 2 Orgs must be selected, and 2.03 #126261273
- If BOC submits to Club, make the assumption that the initiating club is the First org on the list
- For a list on onSubmit business rules, see https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2010367?projectId=14044

title: As a club, I want to ensure that each participating Org gives and receives something in the trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND user is viewing a preliminary trade
AND there is a club participating in the trade that does not have any considerations or is not listed as the "To Org" in any consideration
custom_steps: WHEN user submits the trade
custom_expected: THEN show hard error: "Each club must give and receive at least one consideration"

title: As a club, I want to be stopped if a recently signed FA is being traded for more than 50k **
custom_expected: Message displayed will be "<player> received a consideration in excess of $50,000 for a recently signed XXB free agent."

title: As BOC, I want to ensure that trades are correctly classified as Major or Minor League
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: When a Trade is being moved to the status of "Submit to BOC" from "Submit to Club"
custom_expected:
THEN if the Trade is a Minor League trade, verify that all players in the trade are Minor League players. If this check fails and there are MJ players, change the Trade level to Major League.
AND if the trade is a Major league trade, verify that at least one involved player must be in the Major Leagues or on Option. If check fails, then change the Trade level to Minor League.
AND On the BOC clipboard, the trade should display the correct level Major / Minor

title: As a club, I can attach forms for the players in my Org after trade submission
custom_steps:
**Reference**
Button states - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2310830?projectId=14044

**AC**
- While the Trade is in Submitted to Club state, all participating clubs including the initiating club can use the Edit/ Save feature to update the following:
- The Club can use the edit feature to attach forms for any player who is currently in their org
- Club can change the Authorized Signatory for their Org
- Club can edit or add attachments to the general attached files section and udpated the "Received insurance form" date
- Club can edit comments section
- All other fields are not editable by clubs

title: As Club/BOC, I want to see file attachment rule checks on Save
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as club or BOC
custom_steps: WHEN a club or BOC user attaches files in any state, run the standard global file attachment rule checks on save and on state changes
custom_expected:
THEN run the standard global file attachment rule checks on save and on state changes:

- Check to make sure that the file attachment is correct format - use the following message:
Eg. Attached file is not in a valid PDF format. Verify or re-scan and re-attach.
 
- Do not reuse a label that can only be used once. Only Miscellaneous maybe re-used as a label. Note that each player has a separate unique set of labels
Eg. Only one file attachment may have the label '[Label name]'.
 
- The label is a required field for all attachments. If the label is not populated for any row, when the club tries to SAVE, show required field warning
"Attached Files - Label is a required field"

- Only show the error once even if multiple rows are missing labels

title: UAT feedback: Show trade on the clipboard when it's "Submitted to Club"
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there exists a preliminary Trade
custom_steps: WHEN trade reaches "pending to club" status,
custom_expected: THEN it should show on the BOC clipboard

title: As a participating club, I can see a trade I need to approve on Action items clipboard
custom_steps:
**Reference**
Button states - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2310830?projectId=14044

**AC**
- Once the initiating club submits the Trade to other clubs, each of the participating clubs will simultaneously receive an action item.
- Clicking on the action item will open the Trade in view mode. Refer to button table for available buttons
- The Action item has type = Transaction and Description = "Outright Trade submitted to Club by [Org 3 letter abbreviation]. It also shows the player name and date/time. If multiple players involved, show "Multiple"

title: As a Club, I want player's Pending Org and roster status to get updated on submitting him as a named player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the preconditions in the previous test case are met
custom_steps: WHEN the PTBNL reaches Submitted to BOC
custom_expected: All AC in [574801](http://10.199.1.138/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/574801) and [574798](http://10.199.1.138/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/574798) should be met for the nominated player

title: As a Club/BOC, I want to see Player History updated with the Trade information
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as club or BOC
custom_steps: WHEN a Trade reaches Submitted to BOC state
custom_expected:
THEN Player history now has an entry in green font for each player involved in the Trade.
AND the description for the entry is "Outright (Trade)" and it only has the Org/club he originated from and got traded to (even if other clubs were also involved in the trade)
AND the description clicks into the Trade form
AND while the trade is pending, it's only visible to all participating Orgs + BOC

title: As a club, I can reject a trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as a club
AND club is viewing trade submitted to them
custom_steps: WHEN club hits the 'Reject' button on the Trade
custom_expected:
THEN this updates the transaction status to "Rejected"
AND page reloads for rejecting club with updated button set. See button state table
AND any action items for other participating clubs are automatically removed 
AND all other participating clubs gets a notification with Description = Outright (Trade)  is rejected by [Org]
AND the notification links back to the Transaction. The initiating club sees an updated button set with full edit access similar to preliminary
AND initiating club can resubmit the rejected Trade to "Submit to Club" state or can delete the transaction
AND no rule checks should be run

**Global**
- Show blue success notification - "The transaction has been successfully rejected"
- The status and dates section updates with latest state change

**Reference**
Button states - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2310830?projectId=14044

title: As BOC, I can see the trade on my clipboard when all clubs have approved the Trade
custom_steps:
**Reference**
Button states - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2310830?projectId=14044

**AC**
- When all participating clubs have submitted the Trade to BOC, the Trade updates to "Submitted to BOC" state. Until then, it stays as Submitted to Club.
- Once the Trade reaches Submitted to BOC, it appears on the BOC's Clipboard similar to other Transactions. 
- The From Org is the initiating club. If more than 3 clubs are involved, the "To Org" column can say "Multiple".
- BOC can click on the Trade from the clipboard to see it in view mode. Updated button set should show on the form based on the button state table
- While the trade is in Submitted to BOC state, clubs can continue to have basic edit access listed in story #129462267. Use the player's "pending org" to determine if the club can attach forms for that player

title: As BOC, I can reject a Trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as BOC
AND viewing a submitted trade
custom_steps: WHEN BOC hits the Reject button on the Trade
custom_expected:
THEN this updates the transaction to "Rejected"
AND reverses all Submit updates in story #129462741
AND page reloads for BOC with updated button set. See button state table
AND all participating clubs get a notification with Description = Outright (Trade) is rejected by BOC
AND initiating club receives a rejection notification. (The notification links back to the Transaction. The initiating club sees an updated button set with full edit access similar to preliminary. Other Orgs only see it in view mode with a Close button.)
AND initiating club can resubmit the rejected Trade to "Submit to Club" state or can delete the transaction
AND remove transaction from approvals clipboard and from Player history

**Reference**
Button states - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2310830?projectId=14044

**Global**
- Show blue success notification - "The transaction has been successfully rejected"
- The status and dates section updates with latest state change

title: As BOC, I want to approve a trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN BOC clicks the 'Approve' button on the Trade.
custom_expected:
THEN this updates the transaction status to "Approved"
AND after approval, page reloads for BOC with updated button set. 
AND BOC can also perform this action by selecting the transaction on the clipboard and hitting Approve as a single or bulk operation
AND when the transaction is approved, all participating Orgs get a clipboard notification "Outright (Trade) is approved"
AND Trade now becomes viewable to all other clubs though they cannot see attachments and comments
AND Player history entry becomes black font and is visible to all clubs
AND Clipboard approval item is removed for BOC
AND player's service calculation and 10/5 calc is updated 

**Global**
- Show success notification - "The transaction has been successfully Approved"
- Approve button is blue
- Status and dates section must update

**Reference**
Button states - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2310830?projectId=14044

title: As BOC, I can reverse a trade
custom_steps:
**Reference**
Button states - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2310830?projectId=14044

**AC**
- BOC can hit the 'Reverse' button on an Approved Trade. This updates the transaction status to "Reversed"
- BOC may only reverse this trade if it is the most recent approved transaction for all involved players. If not, show hard error "Only a player's latest approved transaction can be reversed"
- Reverse all Approval updates in story #129463383 and reset all players to their Org/roster status prior to the transaction. 
- Page reloads for BOC with updated button set. See button state table
- All participating clubs get a notification with Description = Outright (Trade)  is reversed
- Player history and daily trans bulletin gets (Voided) next to description
- If an auto-recall was created, that gets reversed also.
- Rule 4 draft picks traded value and intl signing bonus slot adjustments must be reversed to their original value

**Global**
- Show blue success notification - "The transaction has been successfully reversed"
- The status and dates section updates with latest state change

title: As BOC, I want to be stopped from approving the Trade if prior unapproved transactions exist
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN approving a trade
custom_expected:
THEN in addition to running all the On-Submit rules, Bus rule 2.51 (A Player's transaction cannot be approved until other pending transactions with earlier dates have been approved) is also run 
AND if the rule fails, show error "A transaction cannot occur before the date of the player's latest approved or pending transaction"

title: As BOC, I want to be stopped from approving a future Trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN approving a trade
custom_expected:
THEN in addition to running all the On-Submit rules, This rule is also run on approval and is a hard error for BOC: Bus rule 2.52 - The Transaction Date must not be after the current date. 
AND if rule fails, show error: "This transaction cannot be approved unless the Transaction date is on or before the current date"

title: As a Club, I want an optioned player to get recalled automatically when Trade is approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as club
AND a trade includes at least one optioned player
custom_steps: WHEN the trade is approved
custom_expected:
THEN create a Recall-Not to Report Transaction for any player whose MJ roster status was Optioned prior to the Trade
AND the Recall transaction should be auto-approved with a Submitted to BOC time stamp of one second prior to the Trade's Submit to BOC timestamp, and an approved time stamp of one second prior to the Trade's approved timestamp.
AND on the recall transaction, set the From Org/ From club to the Major league Org and club that player is originating from
AND the recall transaction should do all of it's usual post submission/approval updates

title: As BOC, I want an approved Trade to appear on the Daily Transaction Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as BOC
AND a trade involves any MJ players
custom_steps: WHEN the trade is approved
custom_expected:
THEN update the Daily transaction bulletin. Refer linked Jama document for formatting
AND for each player movement, create entry under both the receiving and originating Org
AND minor lg players are also listed in the bulletin if they were part of the MJ trade
AND draft picks and Intl SB slot trades are also listed in the bulletin under both receiving org and originating org

**Reference**
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2309499?projectId=14044

title: As a user, I want the Current MJ Acquisition Date to get updated on a trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN that an org has started a trade of an MJ player to an MJ org
custom_steps:
WHEN the trade is Approved
AND that trade is then Reversed
custom_expected:
THEN populate the "Current Maj Lg Aquisition" field on the Info tab of the Player Profile with the Org, date of the move and where they came from
AND this field is updated on Approve 
AND this field is reverted on Reverse

title: As a club, I want to name a player post-trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is a club that has received a PTBNL consideration in a trade
AND that trade is approved
AND the user is viewing this form
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks Edit
AND clicks Name Player under the PTBNL consideration table
custom_expected:
THEN The player section fields work the same as when adding a player under Player consideration. Written consent, print/upload, Add C and Special covenant flag logic should apply
AND The "From club" field is locked and shows the player's current affiliate. Pos and Roster status autoANDpopulate
AND If the player is Minor league, the "To club" field is editable so the user can select the Minor league affiliate.
AND If player is MJ league, the "To Club" is locked since the player can only move to the MJ roster.
AND Club can delete the player and name a different player
AND Once a player is picked, the 'Submit to Club' button appears and is blue. The "Name player" button disables itself.
AND Selecting 'Submit to club' will move the PTBNL transaction to 'Submitted to Club' Status. Blue notification appears and page reloads with neither button. The PTBNL is no longer editable by club
AND BOC can perform this action on behalf of any club

title: As a club, I want to be stopped if I name a player after the agreed on deadline to name him
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is viewing an approved trade with a preliminary Player to be named later consideration
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks Name Player 
AND sets the date of the PTBNL is after the "Player must be named before" date on the PTBNL consideration
AND the user submits the player to named, run rule checks
custom_expected:
THEN show a hard error for the club
AND show a warning for the BOC

title: As a club, I want to see rule checks on a named player
As a club, I want to reject a named player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is a club
AND the user is viewing a trade with a submitted PTBNL
AND they are the receiving club
custom_steps: WHEN the club hits the 'Reject' button on the PTBNL
custom_expected:
THEN This updates the transaction status to "Rejected"
AND Page reloads for rejecting club with no buttons
AND Action item is cleared from approving club's clipboard.
AND The initiating Club gets a notification with Description = Player to be Named Later  is rejected by [Org]
AND The notification links back to the Transaction. The initiating club sees the option to delete the named player and add a different player and re-submit

title: As a Club, I want to approve a named player post-trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a PTBNL transaction has been submitted to a club
custom_steps: WHEN the receiving club logs in and views the clipboard widget
custom_expected:
THEN  the club that the player is going to receives as action item. (Note that any other participating clubs do not get the action item)
AND The Action item has type = Transaction and Description = "Player to be Named submitted to Club by [Org 3 letter abbreviation]." AND It also shows the player name and date/time
AND Club can click on the Action item to open the Trade. They see a 'Submit to BOC' blue button and a grey Reject button under the PTBNL. 
AND Approving club can edit the trade to add forms for the player and update the Received insurance form date. They cannot edit any of the player details or change the player.
AND Run attach file rule checks on Save
AND If Club hits Submit to BOC, the PTBNL transaction gets updated to Submitted to BOC state. 
AND Page reloads without the PTBNL buttons after submission to BOC
AND Player history now has an Outright Trade entry in green font for this player on the date of the PTBNL
AND The action item is cleared from the club's clipboard
AND BOC can perform this action on behalf of clubs
AND Show blue success notification

title: As BOC, I want to reject a named player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the same preconditions as the previous test case
AND the receiving club has submitted the PTBNL to BOC
custom_steps: WHEN BOC logs in and views the trade
custom_expected:
THEN BOC can hit the 'Reject' button on the Trade. This updates the PTBNL transaction status to "Rejected"
AND Reverse all Submit updates in story #129474671 for the PTBNL
AND Page reloads for BOC with updated button set as if the PTBNL was back in Preliminary
AND Initiating and approving club receives a rejection notification. The notification links back to the Transaction. The initiating club sees an updated button set  similar to preliminary which will allow them to delete the existing player and name a different player. 
AND Initiating club can resubmit the PTBNL to "Submit to Club" state or choose to simply delete the PTBNL (but not the actual consideration itself)
AND Remove transaction from approvals clipboard and from Player history
AND Show blue success notification "The transaction has been successfully rejected"

title: As a Club, I want player's Pending Org and roster status to get updated on submitting him as a named player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the preconditions in the previous test case are met
custom_steps: WHEN the PTBNL reaches Submitted to BOC
custom_expected: All AC in [574801](http://10.199.1.138/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/574801) and [574798](http://10.199.1.138/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/574798) should be met for the nominated player

title: As a club, I want to be stopped if I name a player who was active in the Majors since the Trade was agreed on
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is naming a player on a trade 
AND player was active in the major leauge between the original trade date and the date of the PTBNL
custom_steps: WHEN club submits the player
custom_expected: THEN they see an error "Player to be named cannot be active on a Major League roster between the trade date and the Date Named"

title: As Boc, I want to approve a named player post-trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is BOC
AND a club has submitted a PTBNL to the BOC
custom_steps: WHEN BOC views the clipboard
custom_expected:
THEN the PTBNL it appears on BOC clipboard for approval
AND Clicking on the approval item opens the Trade in view mode
AND BOC sees Approve and Reject buttons below the PTBNL
AND Approving the PTBNL moves this transaction status to approved and the page reloads without the buttons.
AND Run BOC on-submit rule checks before approval
AND global approval rule checks (cannot be approved while other transactions are pending, and cannot be dated before the latest approved transaction)
AND Once the PTBNL is approved, update player's current Org and roster status.
AND All clubs can now view the named player but can no longer see the original Alt cash section. BOC continues to see this section.
AND If player was on option, he must be recalled
AND Make an entry in the Daily Transaction bulletin if player is major league
AND Player history entry is now black font
AND Show blue success notification on approval

title: As a Club/BOC, I can create an Outright to Mexican League transaction
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the create new button for a minor league player
custom_expected:
THEN there is an option called "Outright to Mexican League" under minor assignments
AND The transaction should have all the same functionality  as a Trade except for some differences which will be covered in later stories
AND "Mex" replaces the 2nd Org on the screen. It is locked to the screen and neither the initiating org nor MEX can be removed
AND Remove the "Add org" button from this transaction
AND There is no "Authorized signatory" field for MEX but there is one for MLB org
AND There is no "Trade Checklist" print option
AND Transaction can be saved as preliminary

title: As Club/BOC, I can submit the Outright to Mex Lg tx to BOC
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has created an OTML and filled in all required fields
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN Transaction appears on the BOC clipboard once submitted to BOC.
AND Status and Dates section is updated.
AND Blue notification is generated
AND Reload page after state change
AND BOC and club should see correct buttons (https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2281404?projectId=14044)
AND Clubs can no longer modify the transaction except for attached forms, auth signatory and comments
AND The player's new Pending Org is set to MEX and Pending club is the Mexican club  (in the database)
AND player's new Pending roster status is displayed in the UI/header
- Player history entry is created in green font with description "Outright to Mexican League"

title: As club/BOC, I can add PTBNL considerations to an OTML transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing an OTML
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Add Consideration under the MLB org
custom_expected:
THEN they can add a Player to be Named Later consideration
AND this option is not available for the Mex orrg
AND this consideration behaves the same as on trades, except it does not have a pay schedule button
AND the "To" club is limited to Mex clubs that are already receiving a regular player in this outright.

title: As club/BOC, I can add cash considerations to an OTML transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has created an OTML
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks Add Consideration
AND selects Cash Consideration
custom_expected:
THEN the user can enter an amount
AND the user can enter a pay schedule
AND the "To" field will only allow you to choose Mex clubs that a player is being traded to. Only these clubs will appear in the dropdown
AND If Cash is added to MEX, the "To" field is pre-populated and locked to the MLB Org
AND Payment date is not editable by club

title: As a Club/BOC, I can add additional players to an Outright to Mexican League transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing a preliminary OTML
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks "Add Row" on the Player Consideration
AND selects a player
custom_expected:
THEN user can see all players in the Org (except MJ players) available in the player dropdown
AND There is no "received insurance form" field for any added players
AND Insurance form cannot be printed. There is no label for this form when attaching files
AND there Addendum C logic.
AND The TO ORG is always locked to MEX. The TO CLUB shows a list of MEX clubs

title: As a club/BOC, I can see rule checks when I submit an outright to mex lg tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user has created a preliminary OTML
custom_steps: WHEN user submits an OTML
custom_expected:
THEN the OnSubmit rule checks are run on the transaction: Rules - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2351678?projectId=14044
AND required field checks are run
AND file attachment rule checks are run (see #129712017 in references)
AND they are run if BOC is submitting on behalf of club with appropriate overrides

title: As club/BOC, I want to be stopped from creating an OTML tx on a Major league player
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks create new for a major league player
AND tries to select an Outright to Mex league transaction
custom_expected: THEN the user sees the blocker message: "This transaction is for Minor League players only"

title: As a club, I want to be stopped from creating OTML if player is not affiliated with my Org
custom_steps: WHEN user tries to create an OTML for a player that is not affiliated with their org
custom_expected: THEN the user sees a blocker error

title: As a club, I want to be stopped if OTML date is between Reserve list filing date and Rule 5 draft
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that club has created an OTML and filled out all required fields
AND today is after the Reserve list filing date (system date)
AND today is before the Rule 5 draft date (system date)
custom_steps: WHEN user submits an OTML
custom_expected: THEN they see a blocker that says: "You cannot assign a player between the reserve list filing date and the end of the Rule 5 draft"

title: As a club, I want to be stopped from trading a player who is Pending active, Released from roster, or on Bereavement/Paternity/Temp Inactive list
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user has created a trade or an OTML
AND the transaction involves a player with one of the following roster statuses:
- Bereavement List
- Paternity List
- Released from Roster
- Temp Inactive
- Pending Active
custom_steps: WHEN user submits the trade
custom_expected: THEN they see an error message

title: As a club, I can only view limited sections of the OTML
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that there is an approved OTML involving club X
AND there is a preliminary OTML involving X
AND there is a Submitted to BOC OTML involving X
AND each OTML contains a conditional cash consideration
AND each OTML contains a regular cash consideration
custom_steps:
WHEN user logs in as club X
AND user logs in as club Y
custom_expected:
THEN All Clubs can see all approved OTMLs
AND club X and Y cannot see Conditional Cash Considerations even if they are part of the trade
AND Only club X can see the Cash Considerations.
AND OTMLs trades not yet approved can only be viewed by club X
AND Attached files and Comments can only be viewed by club X
AND BOC Notes cannot be viewed by clubs X or Y

title: As BOC, I can reverse, reject or suppress an Outright to MX lg transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that there is an OTML that is Submitted to BOC
AND an approved OTML
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC clicks reject on the Submitted OTML
AND clicks reverse on the Approved OTML
AND then clicks suppress on the Reversed OTML
custom_expected:
THEN BOC can reject the submitted OTML. This will reverse any updates made to the trade/players when it was submitted to BOC
AND Club gets a rejection notification and can update and resubmit the transaction to BOC
AND BOC can reverse the approved OTML. This will reverse all approval updates and change the transaction status to Reversed
AND BOC can suppress the reversed transaction,  this will hide it for the club in all widgets and searches (player history, advanced search, notifications)

title: As BOC, I can approve an Outright to Mx Lg Transaction
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as BOC
AND user is viewing a Submitted to BOC OTML
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Approve
custom_expected:
THEN Run the applicable OnSubmit rule checks but with overrides for BOC
AND the state change buttons appears as listed in https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2281404?projectId=14044
AND Transaction is no longer editable for BOC with the exception of fields mentioned in #129708081
AND Status and Dates section is updated.
AND Blue notification is generated
AND Reload page after state change
AND Player's Pending Org (MEX) and Pending Club should become his current Org and club

title: As a user I want to see a spinner when a widget is retrieving additional data
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the Addendum C widget
AND rapidly scrolls down the widget past records that are currently loaded in the widget
custom_expected: THEN the widget shows a spinning icon until it has loaded all the records

title: Select All in widgets selects All rows
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is viewing a widget with more than 400 results (for example, 2000)
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the "select all" box
custom_expected:
THEN the widget footer will read "400 of 2000 entries selected - select all 2000" with "select all 2000" being a blue link.
AND scrolling down and selecting additional entries will update this total
AND clicking "select all X" in the footer selects all x entries
AND the footer reads "X of X entries selected"

title: As BOC, I want to search for Players who were named later
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there exsist trades in the system with Player to be Named Later considerations
custom_steps: WHEN player conducts an advanced search for Trade transactions
custom_expected:
THEN 'Player to be named later' is an option in the Outright (Trade) Consideration filter under Transactions search
AND All transaction filters can be used for searching for these transactions. Additionally they should show up in search results when doing general transaction searches
AND Results appear with the same column set as other transactions
AND When listing search results, each named player has their own row. Do not include PTBNL sections where player is not yet named.

title: As a club, I want to print a Life insurance form for each player in the Trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND is viewing a trade
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Print next to a player
custom_expected: THEN the user can print a Life Insurance form

title: As a club, I want to print a Life insurance form for each player in the Trade in Spanish
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND is viewing a trade involving a Spanish-speaking player
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Print next to that player
custom_expected: THEN the user can print a Life Insurance form in Spanish

title: As a Club, I want to print an Assignment Agreement for the trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is logged in as a club
AND is viewing a trade
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Print at the bottom of the trade form
custom_expected:
THEN the Assignment Agreement can be printed
AND If more than 2 clubs are involved, list all clubs on the same AA. For example, if there were 3 clubs involved, the opening para would say ...between the Oakland Athletics, Chicago Whitesox and New York Mets."
AND each club involved has their own signature section with a maximum of 2 signature blocks side-by-side
AND the signature section has the name of the authorized signatory populated on the appropriate line

title: As a club, I want to print an Assignment Agreement for a PTBNL
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is viewing a trade
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks print at the bottom of the form
AND selects Assignment Agreement
custom_expected:
THEN The Assignment Agreement form for the named player can be printed from the PRINT button on the named player row. There is one for each named player.
AND The AA can be printed at any state in the stateflow including post approval

title: As a club, I can print an Assignment Agreement for Outright to mexican league
custom_steps: See previous test case

title: As a Club, I want to print the Trades Checklist  with mandatory checklist items
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is viewing an MJ trade
custom_steps: WHEN the user hits print and chooses Checklist
custom_expected:
THEN open a PDF of the Trade Checklist in a new tab
AND this option Only appears on Major League trades
AND The Trade checklist has some checklist items that are displayed always, while other checklist items are conditional. For this story, generate a PDF with the mandatory checklist items. Refer to the item-by-item requirements for text to display and order
- Deferred Compensation section
- Medical Info section
- Negotiate Extension section
- Verify Entry section
- Life insurance section

title: As a club, I want a checklist item to agree on alt cash amount if players are to be named later
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is printing a trade checklist
custom_steps:
WHEN the user adds a player to be named later section to the trade
AND prints the trade checklist
custom_expected:
THEN add the "Players to be named later" checklist item
AND  shows the alternate cash consideration amount

title: As a club, I want a checklist item if any of the traded players require Trade waivers
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is printing a trade checklist
custom_steps: WHEN there is a player that requires trade waivers
custom_expected: THEN add the "Trade Waivers"  checklist item if the conditions are met.

title: As a club, I want a checklist item if player was a recent draft selection
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is printing a trade checklist
custom_steps: WHEN the trade includes a player drafted in the most recent domestic amateur draft
custom_expected: THEN print the R4 draft pick checklist item

title: As a club, I want a checklist item to contact LRD if a CB Lottery draft pick will be traded
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is printing a trade checklist
custom_steps: WHEN the trade includes a lottery draft pick
custom_expected: THEN include the CBB draft pick checklist item

title: As a club, I want a checklist item if an Intl signing bonus slot will be traded
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is printing a trade checklist
custom_steps: WHEN the trade includes an international signing bonus slot
custom_expected: THEN include the Int'l signing bonus slot checklist item

title: As a club, I want a checklist item if a traded player has miscellaneous clauses and covenants in his major contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is printing a trade checklist
custom_steps: WHEN the trade includes MJ players with a "miscellaneous clauses and covenants" flag
custom_expected: THEN include the miscellaneous clauses and covenants checklist item

title: As a club, I want a checklist item to get written consent if a recently signed FA is being traded prior to June 16
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user is printing a trade checklist
custom_steps: WHEN the trade includes a player that requires consent for being a recent XXB free agent
custom_expected: THEN include the free agent checklist item

title: As a Club, I want to print a Notice of Disposition for each player in the Trade in English
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user is viewing a trade form with at least one player
AND org from which those players are coming has an authorized signatory selected,
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the print button next to a player in the player consideration table
custom_expected:
THEN print a notice of disposition for that player
AND include the club's authorized signatory

title: As a Club, I want to print a Notice of Disposition for each player in the Trade in Spanish
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user is following the steps in the previous test case
AND the player has a spoken language of "Spanish" selected
custom_steps: WHEN the user prints the form
custom_expected: THEN the Spanish version of the form prints

title: As Club, I can print a Notice of Disposition for a player outrighted to Mexican League
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user is viewing an Outright to Mexican league transaction
AND the user is otherwise following the steps from the previous test case
custom_steps: WHEN the user prints the form
custom_expected:
THEN the form prints as follows:

English:
This disposition notice is to advise you that your contract has been assigned outright to the roster of the [Mex club full name] Club of the Mexican League.

Spanish:
Este aviso de disposicin tiene por objeto notificarle que su contrato ha sido asignado directamente de la alineacin del Club  [Mex club full name] de la Liga Mexicana.
